public class CoreJavaBrushUp3 {                //Main Java class to execute methods
public static void main(String[] args) {       
                                               // TODO Auto-generated method stub
                                               //string is an object //String literal
String s1 = "This is Java selenium Code";
String s5 = "hello";
                                               //string is an object//String new
String s2 = new String("Welcome");
String s3 = new String("Welcome");
String s = "This is Java selenium Code";
String[] splittedString = s.split("Java");      //method call
System.out.println(splittedString[0]);
System.out.println(splittedString[1]);
System.out.println(splittedString[1].trim());
for(int i =s.length()-1;i>=0;i--)               // String reverse logic
{
System.out.println(s.charAt(i));
}
}
}


//************************************Methods Code ***********************
public class MethodsDemo {                       //New class created
public static void main(String[] args) {

                                                 // TODO Auto-generated method stub

MethodsDemo d = new MethodsDemo();
String name = d.getData();                       //object created
System.out.println(name);
MethodsDemo2 d1 = new MethodsDemo2();              //object created
d1.getUserData();                               //method call using object
getData2();
}
public String getData()
{
System.out.println ("hello world");
return "Java Selenium";
}
public static String getData2()
{
System.out.println ("hello world");
return "Java Selenium";
}
}
